snippet: The Broadway season that ended recently has shown that the art of eloquence in theater is very much alive.
abstract: Ben Brantley finds it refreshing that many of the plays on Broadway during the 2012 spring season feature dialogue that is extremely eloquent and witty rather than naturalistic.
lead_paragraph: The Broadway season that ended recently has shown that the art of eloquence in theater is very much alive.

headline.seo: ‘The Best Man’ and ‘Other Desert Cities’ Are Eloquent Plays
headline.main: The Masters of Bons Mots Are Alive and Thriving on Broadway
headline.print_headline: The Masters of Bons Mots Are Alive and Thriving on Broadway
